basic.description: A fundamental study of the structure and growth of microorganisms and viruses. The roles of microbes in aquatic, terrestrial and human environments will be considered.
basic.subject: MICR
basic.title: Basic Microbiology

extra.enrollment_requirement: PREREQUISITES    (A GPA of 1.90 in BIOL 102/3.0 and BIOL 103/3.0) and CHEM 112/6.0.
